TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_hemay, title = hemay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/hemay} }

S.FORM: Hemay han ku manamuh waliay a tademaw (Cong-kow, Hong Kong, Macau, Taywan, Zipun, etip nu Korea atu Vietnam) mukan tu kakanen. naizau tu ku tinku sa, caluway tu kita misahemay. u zuma a kamu: nu Hulam: 米飯 nu Amilika: Cooked rice nu Zipun: めし (Meshi) u canan ku hemay: 米飯, . namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinenganː == malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinenganː ==

Hemay han ko manamoh waliay a tademaw (Cong-kow, Hong Kong, Macao, Taywan, Zipon, etip no Korea ato Vietnam) mokan to kakanen. naizao to ko tinko sa, caloway to kita misahemay. o zoma a kamo: no Holam: 米飯 no Amilika: Cooked rice no Zipon: めし (Meshi) o canan ko hemay: 米飯, . namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinenganː == malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinenganː ==
